name: Onion Salad
recipeCategory: easy, quick, condiments, salads and dressings
keywords: lemon juice, orange, white onion, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 white onions, peeled and sliced thin
1 teaspoon kosher salt or sea salt

recipeInstructions.text: Place the sliced onions in a ceramic bowl, sprinkle with the salt, toss and allow to sit for 5 minutes. Add the orange rind and the lemon and orange juices. Allow to sit for 10 more minutes and serve.
